ygData.subject: Dragoon Dirk
ygData.msgSnippet: Go to Crushbone, still very cheap there, sometimes free - depending who is killing Dvinn, and whether they already have one.
ygData.messageBody:
Go to Crushbone, still very cheap there, sometimes free - depending who is
killing Dvinn, and whether they already have one.



At 12:06 PM 7/26/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>
>> Dragoon Dirk - get one a.s.a.p. 20pp or so in or near Crushbone.
>
>I've been searching (on Veeshan) for one of these for 3 weeks now in various
>zones and continents. The *only* time someone was selling one and replied to
>me was for 75pp. I'm sorry, but magical or not - I'm not paying 75pp for a
>friggin' dagger - at least not that particular dagger.
>
